name: mickey
content:
mickey noun
(MAKE FUN)
take the mickey/mick (out of someone) UK informal
Add to word list
Add to word list
to laugh at someone and make them seem silly, in a funny or unkind way: A group of other boys were taking the mickey out of him.
See more
mickey noun
(DRUG)
[ C ] slang (also Mickey Finn) a drug added to a drink, especially an alcoholic drink, in order to make the person who drinks it unconscious: He must have slipped his wife a mickey.
